intro: Hedyotis mollis, commonly known as the small flame vine, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, bright orange or red flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows as a climbing or trailing plant with slender stems and small, opposite leaves. Hedyotis mollis is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks.
